snippet: Jeff Greene’s Beverly Hills estate, listed at $195 million, is believed to be the most expensive public listing in the country.
abstract: Robert Frank Inside Wealth column observes that real estate billionaire Jeff Greene is selling opulent estate in Beverly Hills, Calif, with list price of $195 million, believed to be most expensive public listing in the country.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Greene’s Beverly Hills estate, listed at $195 million, is believed to be the most expensive public listing in the country.
